posts.body:
>>5f7870eb-1a7a-4685-b3bd-9d13039eef8b
In my opinion the best balance between privacy freedom and convenience is Matrix. If you care less for convenience Retroshare. If you just need a simple chat room and are not interested in communicating with friends and family IRC.

>>b439c793-f1c3-442c-856b-10993c4290d4
1 what about getting news on 4chan pol? 2 freenet sone is safe. Retroshare is safe. IRC and Matrix are okay. Posting on bitchute through tor account is good.

>>c08b6fb3-fae5-4fbf-b2af-4c239f870eb2
But in your opinion is it real? Is Sanders the root cause for the Riots? Links plz

>>2ea54bb7-5331-4165-8c02-5ad42fd42ad4
Is there any instant messenger on Zeronet?

Move the Zeronet folder. Run the following terminal command on Linux:

wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-linux/archive/dist-linux64/ZeroNet-py3-linux64.tar.gz && tar xvpfz ZeroNet-py3-linux64.tar.gz && cd ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/ && ./ZeroNet.sh

Use Tor network + Tor browser for better anonymity.

Create a ZeroID account. Copy the file called Zeronet folder /data/users.json to a folder.

Delete the second Zeronet folder and run the command again to create a third zeronet folder and keep creating new accounts.

Iterate and repeat, that you have a large collection of user.json files.

Move the Original Zeronet folder back, and every time you want to switch between created accounts close the browser and terminal then replace the users.json

>>e1f00fe6-21db-42b3-8ff0-b56fcc273e90
